question: What are the emerging technology trends in the healthcare industry based on recent investments and focus areas of companies?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies that are part of the healthcare industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Retrieve the strategic technology focus areas of the identified healthcare companies from CompanyFocusAreaDetail.
Analyze the IT trends noted in the IndustryITTrend table and correlate them with the focus areas of healthcare companies.
Compile investment data related to technology from CompanyDealMaster that relates to healthcare services and vendors.
Summarize the findings from the analysis to pinpoint emerging technology trends in healthcare based on company focus areas and investment data.
